metadata.description: Full stack engineer with expertise across frontend, backend, databases, and deployment

skills.name: Backend Fundamentals
skills.description: Server-side programming, APIs, databases, authentication, security

skills.name: Frontend Fundamentals
skills.description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React/Vue, responsive design, browser APIs

skills.name: System Design
skills.description: Scalable architecture, distributed systems, microservices, trade-offs

skills.name: Data Structures & Algorithms
skills.description: Arrays, trees, graphs, sorting, searching, dynamic programming

skills.name: Database Design
skills.description: SQL, NoSQL, indexing, query optimization, data modeling

skills.name: React or Vue
skills.description: Component architecture, state management, hooks, lifecycle

skills.name: Backend Framework
skills.description: Express, Django, Spring Boot, FastAPI - server-side frameworks

skills.name: API Design
skills.description: REST, GraphQL, API versioning, documentation, security

skills.name: JavaScript/TypeScript
skills.description: Modern JS, async/await, closures, type systems, ES6+ features

skills.name: DevOps & Deployment
skills.description: Docker, CI/CD, cloud platforms, deployment strategies

skills.name: Testing
skills.description: Unit tests, integration tests, E2E tests, TDD, mocking

skills.name: Performance Optimization
skills.description: Caching, lazy loading, code splitting, database optimization

hero.title: Your personalized roadmap to become a {targetRole} is ready!
hero.description: Based on your experience and goals, we've created a focused path to help you reach the next level.

skillsToLearn.description: critical skills you need to master

hero.videoNotes: Get personal insights from someone who's been there

skillsGap.title: Understand Where You Stand Right Now
skillsGap.description: See what you already know and what you need to master to reach your goal.

currentSkills.title: Skills You Already Have
currentSkills.description: These are your strengths - keep them sharp

highPriority.title: Critical Skills to Master
highPriority.description: These are absolute must-haves for the next level

mediumPriority.title: Important Skills to Build
mediumPriority.description: These will make you significantly more competitive

lowPriority.title: Nice-to-Have Skills

learningPath.title: Your Personalized Learning Path
learningPath.description: A comprehensive path covering frontend, backend, and infrastructure

phasesStructure.focus: Strengthen both frontend and backend basics
Think like an architect across the stack
Get ready for your target role

companiesInsight.title: What Different Companies Expect
companiesInsight.description: Different company types have different interview processes and value propositions. Here's what to expect at each type.

tabs.name: High Growth Startups
tabs.description: Owner mentality, build full features end-to-end

interviewPrep.title: Interview Preparation
interviewPrep.description: Full stack interviews test breadth and depth across the entire stack
interviewPrep.overallStrategy: Demonstrate end-to-end thinking: from database design to frontend optimization. Show you understand trade-offs and can make architectural decisions.

prepTips: Be ready to explain your full stack experience
Have 2-3 end-to-end projects ready to discuss
Show how you've worked across frontend and backend
commonTopics: Projects built from start to finish
How you approach full stack problems
Interest in this role and company

prepTips: Consider both time and space complexity
Start by clarifying requirements and constraints
Design the complete system (frontend, backend, database, infrastructure)

interviewRounds.focus: Build a feature end-to-end or improve existing system
prepTips: Be ready to implement a feature across the stack
Show how you've learned new skills
Ask about team structure and collaboration
commonTopics: Your interests in full stack work

successFactors: Clean code across frontend and backend

recommendedProjects.title: Build Real-World Projects
recommendedProjects.description: End-to-end projects demonstrating full stack capabilities

projects.name: Todo App with Backend API
projects.description: Full stack todo app with React frontend and Node.js backend
projects.whyValuable: Demonstrates full stack basics, REST API design, database operations

projects.name: Blog Platform
projects.description: Simple blog with post creation, editing, and listing
projects.whyValuable: Shows database design, API endpoints, and frontend-backend integration

projectTiers.description: Complex full stack application with advanced features

projects.name: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Full e-commerce site with products, cart, and orders
projects.whyValuable: Complex state management, payment integration, scalable architecture

projects.name: Real-Time Chat Application
projects.description: Chat app with WebSockets, user rooms, and message history
projects.whyValuable: Real-time communication, state management, database design

projects.name: Project Management Tool
projects.description: Collaborative tool for managing projects and tasks
projects.whyValuable: Complex state management, real-time updates, user collaboration

projects.name: Marketplace Platform
projects.description: Multi-vendor marketplace with sellers, buyers, and transactions
projects.whyValuable: Complex system design, microservices thinking, scalability

projects.name: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Real-time analytics dashboard with data visualization
projects.whyValuable: Performance optimization, complex data handling, visualization

projects.name: Social Network Clone
projects.description: Full social platform with users, posts, feeds, and interactions
projects.whyValuable: Large-scale system design, feed algorithms, real-time updates

successIndicators.title: How to Know You're Ready
successIndicators.description: Key milestones before applying to your target role

indicators.indicator: Have 2-3 solid full-stack projects in portfolio

skillMap.title: Your Skill Map
skillMap.description: Compare your skills against the average Full-Stack Engineer

radarAxes.label: DSA
radarAxes.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
radarAxes.description: Your proficiency in solving coding problems using efficient data structures and algorithmic thinking. Essential for technical interviews and problem-solving.

radarAxes.label: System Design
radarAxes.title: System Design
radarAxes.description: Your ability to architect scalable full-stack systems covering both frontend and backend. Critical for senior-level roles.

radarAxes.label: Projects
radarAxes.title: Project Experience
radarAxes.description: Your hands-on experience building complete end-to-end projects. Demonstrates full-stack capabilities and problem-solving.

radarAxes.label: Languages
radarAxes.title: Frontend & Backend Languages
radarAxes.description: Your proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript (frontend) and backend languages. The foundation of full-stack development.

radarAxes.label: Databases
radarAxes.title: Database & Data Skills
radarAxes.description: Your knowledge of databases, queries, and data management. Essential for building complete data-driven applications.

tech.label: DSA
tech.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
tech.description: Your proficiency in solving coding problems using efficient data structures and algorithmic thinking. Essential for technical interviews and backend optimization.

tech.label: System Design
tech.title: System Design
tech.description: Your ability to design scalable full-stack systems, databases, and architectures. Critical for building production-grade applications.

tech.label: Projects
tech.title: Project Experience
tech.description: Your hands-on experience building real-world full-stack projects. Demonstrates practical knowledge and problem-solving abilities.

tech.label: Languages

tech.description: Your proficiency in full-stack programming languages for both frontend and backend development.

tech.label: Databases
tech.title: Database & SQL

nonTech.label: DSA
nonTech.title: Data Structures & Algorithms
nonTech.description: Your foundational coding ability. Understanding how to solve problems with efficient structures and logic.

nonTech.title: Full Stack Fundamentals
nonTech.description: Your grasp of core full-stack concepts like APIs, databases, and web architecture. Foundation for career growth.

nonTech.label: Projects

nonTech.description: Real-world projects you've built. Shows practical application of concepts and portfolio strength.

nonTech.label: Languages
nonTech.title: Programming Languages

nonTech.label: Databases
